messages.author: jam
messages.text: we usually set this in the constructor. that way the id stays the same even if the process crashes. it's also simpler to have the id from the beginning, instead of having some period of time when we don't have an id

messages.author: arthurhsu
messages.text:
On 2011/09/19 16:31:17, John Abd-El-Malek wrote:
> we usually set this in the constructor. that way the id stays the same even if
> the process crashes. it's also simpler to have the id from the beginning,
> instead of having some period of time when we don't have an id

Done.

messages.author: jam
messages.text: no need for this getter since it's only used in the class

messages.author: jam
messages.text: nit: this should just be called process_id_ to be consistent with our other usages of this (i.e. we don't say unique_process_id anywhere)

messages.author: jam
messages.text:
1) this currently doesn't do anything, since it's using the pid instead of the process id

2) why not do this in RenderMessageFilter::OnChannelError (not currently overriden, but can be for this purpose)? that way all the font related code is in one place

messages.author: arthurhsu
messages.text:
On 2011/09/19 16:31:17, John Abd-El-Malek wrote:
> 1) this currently doesn't do anything, since it's using the pid instead of the
> process id
> 
> 2) why not do this in RenderMessageFilter::OnChannelError (not currently
> overriden, but can be for this purpose)? that way all the font related code is
> in one place

Done.

messages.author: jam
messages.text:
messages in this file start with ChildProcessMsg or ChildProcessHostMsg. ChromeUtilityHostMsg would belong in chrome_utility_messages.h, and ViewHostMsg would belong in view_messages.h

also, sorry if I wasn't clear, but the reason I said these should be moved here is so that we avoid duplicate messages for the same purpose. i.e. there should be just one ChildHostMsg_PreCacheFont, and one ChildHostMsg_ReleaseCachedFonts

messages.author: arthurhsu
messages.text:
On 2011/09/19 16:31:17, John Abd-El-Malek wrote:
> messages in this file start with ChildProcessMsg or ChildProcessHostMsg.
> ChromeUtilityHostMsg would belong in chrome_utility_messages.h, and ViewHostMsg
> would belong in view_messages.h
> 
> also, sorry if I wasn't clear, but the reason I said these should be moved here
> is so that we avoid duplicate messages for the same purpose. i.e. there should
> be just one ChildHostMsg_PreCacheFont, and one ChildHostMsg_ReleaseCachedFonts

Done.
